review: The device is super portable. I like that it provides a way to watch Plex, Netflix, and Amazon content. This device can be a bit slow compared to the actual Fire TV but I can understand that due to it's small size. I got this to take on trips (where we could hook it up to the TV in a hotel and use the free wifi) for cartoons for our kid. I used to have all Apple TV's throughout the house and they have now all been replaced by Fire TV's due to the support for Plex out of the box.
